content:
I posted this after being prompted by the app as a suggested way to link to a topic (the whole popup where you type in stream, hit >, and then topic characters):

pnkfelix said:

zulip stream: #t-compiler/major changes > Add TyKind::Const and remove `GenericAr… compiler-team#453
The generated link did not work though. Any idea’s what’s up there? Is it an issue with the choice of title or something?
Looks like it breaks on anything with a backtick.
I think it requires two backticks in the topic name, at least with the reproducer I generated. I've opened https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/19873 to track this bug.
